About me

Hello, my name is Anton and I'm from Moscow, Russia. Currently I'm living in Amsterdam, Netherlands. I'm passionate about frontend development. I have participate in many project as an employee and as a freelance developer.

My current everyday stack is TypeScript, Angular, RxJS and related technologies, also I'm keep on expand my knowledge with backend development with C#, ASP .NET MVC and NestJS. Also I'm keen on programming basics such as an algorythms, patterns and data structures, project architectural basics (S.O.L.I.D.), basic of OOP etc.

Experience

October 2019

ZyLAB Technologies B.V.

Software Developer

Part of R&D team. Developing frontend part for the new features for companies main project ZyLAB ONE. Supporting, refactoring and improving current code and features.

April 2017 - October 2019

Solit Clouds

Software Developer

As a Software Developer at Solit-Clouds I was developing user interfaces for IMIAS (Integrated Medical Information Analytical System).

Frontend Developer / HTML-coder

July 2016 — February 2017

Was mentoring the group of 10 attendance at JavaScript course

Freelance

Occasionally I've done some projects as a freelancer. Mostly this projects needed a markup from PSD to HTML, CSS and some basic coding for effects, popup, forms validation and sending/fetching data to/from server.
